ActCanada Shipping Act
PrecisEnactment of the BALLAST WATER CONTROL AND MANAGEMENT REGULATIONS which will require ships to manage their ballast water in such a manner as to reduce the risk of introducing non-indigenous organisms into Canadian waters.
